Description: Spacious Beacon Hill 2 bedroom apartment. Very close to MGH and the Red line. Available for move in on 9/1/2023. Hardwood flooring through out the apartment. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Beautiful exposed brick. Big windows for plenty of natural lighting. Heat and hot water included. Laundry on site. 1 months broker fee. Call now!
